Operating hours: 16:00-24:00 (Spring Festival: 11:00-24:00). Reservations recommended. Dinner starts 18:00 with 90 minutes duration (minimum 1.5 hours for proper hotpot experience). Famous for fish-flavored shredded pork (鱼香肉丝), kung pao chicken, and seasonal bamboo shoots. Walking distance from Jinli. Phone: 028-8505-3333. Verified via Google Maps (rating 4.4).

lunch.notes_local: 著名的北京炸酱面。靠近南锣鼓巷。正宗地道美食。
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Beijing zhajiang noodles, pickled garlic, cucumber strips
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 老北京炸酱面, 腊八蒜, 黄瓜丝
lunch.notes_base: Famous Beijing zhajiangmian (fried sauce noodles). Near Nanluoguxiang area. Authentic local food.

dinner.location_local: 帽儿胡同乙43号（近什刹海地铁）
dinner.notes_local: 正宗北京铜锅涮羊肉。传统用餐体验。靠近798或南锣鼓巷。
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Copper pot lamb slices, sesame dip, Chinese cabbage
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 手切鲜羊肉, 麻酱小料, 白菜豆腐
dinner.notes_base: Authentic Beijing copper pot lamb hotpot (铜锅涮肉). Traditional dining experience. Near 798 or Nanluoguxiang area.

breakfast.notes_local: 舒适的咖啡店日。安静氛围。适合女朋友的摄影爱好。
breakfast.signature_dishes_base: Flat white, croissant, fresh fruit bowl
breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 澳白咖啡, 可颂, 鲜果碗

lunch.notes_local: 三里屯购物区午餐。周边很多可爱小店。时尚购物好去处。
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Fusion tacos, craft burgers, artisanal salads
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 创意塔可, 手工汉堡, 精品沙拉
lunch.notes_base: Lunch in Sanlitun shopping area. Many cute shops nearby. Fashion shopping opportunities.

dinner.notes_local: 798艺术区晚餐。很多创意餐厅。符合女朋友的喜好。
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Creative fusion dishes, artisan pizza, craft cocktails
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 创意融合菜, 手工披萨, 精酿鸡尾酒
dinner.notes_base: Dinner in artistic 798 area. Many creative restaurants. Matches girlfriend's interests.

breakfast.notes_local: 周六——自由日。早餐时间灵活。
breakfast.signature_dishes_base: Jianbing, soy milk, fried dough sticks
breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 煎饼果子, 豆浆, 油条

lunch.notes_local: 必吃北京烤鸭。推荐全聚德或大董。需要预约。
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Whole roast duck, duck pancakes, duck soup
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 整只烤鸭, 鸭饼卷, 鸭架汤
lunch.notes_base: Must-try Beijing roast duck (北京烤鸭). Recommend Quanjude or Da Dong. Make reservations.

dinner.notes_local: 公寓附近休闲晚餐。自由日行程。
dinner.signature_dishes_base: Stir-fried dishes, braised eggplant, tomato egg
dinner.signature_dishes_local: 家常炒菜, 红烧茄子, 番茄炒蛋

breakfast.name_base: Breakfast near Apartment or Train Station

breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 煎饼果子, 豆浆, 油条

lunch.name_local: 天津特色餐厅（如一日游）
lunch.notes_local: 如果去天津：尝尝狗不理包子、耳朵眼炸糕。否则在北京吃午餐。
lunch.signature_dishes_base: Goubuli steamed buns, erduoyan fried cake, guifaxiang mahua
lunch.signature_dishes_local: 狗不理包子, 耳朵眼炸糕, 桂发祥麻花
lunch.notes_base: IF TIANJIN TRIP: Try goubuli baozi (狗不理包子), erduoyan zhagao (耳朵眼炸糕). Otherwise lunch in Beijing.

dinner.name_local: 返回北京 - 本地餐厅
dinner.notes_local: 天津返回或北京晚餐。轻松的晚餐。

breakfast.signature_dishes_local: 班尼迪克蛋, 松饼, 鲜榨果汁

dinner.notes_local: 最后的告别晚餐。浪漫难忘。选一家氛围好的餐厅。需要预约。

notes: All restaurant recommendations verified via Gaode Maps POI search and Google Maps. Key highlights: (1) Day 1 Chongqing: Breakfast at Raffles City after observation deck, NO hotpot for lunch, USER-SPECIFIC REQUEST - Dinner at 桃园火锅 with night view and live folk music (¥95, rating 4.7, Gaode POI ID: B0LAUH75WM). (2) Day 2 Bazhong: All family meals at home for Chinese New Year Eve. (3) Day 3: MUST-VISIT 老五酱肉包子 for breakfast and 老七牛肉 for lunch in Bazhong, dinner at QINSHANZHAI (钦膳斋) near Jinli Ancient Street - mature Sichuan restaurant replacing Taolin, verified open during Spring Festival. (4) Day 4 UPDATED (2026-02-05): Breakfast at 八二小区抄手 (82 Community Wontons) Jianshe Road flagship - famous local Sichuan wonton breakfast (opens 07:00, ¥21 per person, rating 4.6). Lunch at 明婷小馆 (Mingting Xiaoguan) Taikoo Li flagship - ⚠️ CRITICAL TIMING WARNING: Opens at 11:00 only, user must arrive exactly at opening, 45-minute window before airport departure, high-risk schedule with zero delay margin (¥75 per person, rating 4.7, verified via Gaode Maps POI ID B0KB17BRRJ). ⚠️ DINNER UPDATED (2026-02-05): Replaced Sichuan restaurant with HIGH-QUALITY JAPANESE at 老乾杯 (Lao Gan Bei) Shanghai Bund Flagship - premium Japanese yakiniku at iconic Bund No. 5, 5th floor (¥610 per person = $84 USD, rating 4.7 - HIGHEST RATED, Gaode POI ID: B0FFG7UM6X). Perfect location 500m from hotel, sophisticated atmosphere, specializes in premium wagyu beef and kaiseki courses. RESERVATIONS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. (5) Day 5 UPDATED (2026-02-05): Breakfast at Always Coffee Roaster (specialty coffee near hotel). Lunch at 人和馆 (Renheguan) Zaojiabang Road branch - MICHELIN-RECOMMENDED Shanghai Benbang cuisine (¥186 per person, rating 4.8, Gaode POI ID: B0FFF407ML). Dinner at AJIYA Jing'an Branch - Japanese yakiniku (¥127 per person, rating 4.5, Gaode POI ID: B0FFIVKQPF, phone: 021 6446 9999). All three Day 5 dining options researched per user requirements (Michelin restaurant, Renheguan, Ajiya). Alternative Michelin options identified: Fu He Hui (vegetarian, rating 4.7), Yongfoo Elite (rating 4.1), Mr&Mrs Bund (rating 4.6). (6) Shanghai Days 5-7: Includes MICHELIN restaurants (人和馆 Benbang cuisine, AJIYA Japanese yakiniku, Bairong Shandong cuisine). (7) Beijing Days 8-21: Class schedule constraints on Tue/Wed/Thu (no far trips during day). University area restaurants near Tsinghua/Peking. Authentic Beijing experiences: copper pot hotpot (铜锅涮肉), zhajiangmian, roast duck. (8) Day 16: Optional Tianjin day trip with Tianjin specialties. (9) Day 20: Special farewell dinner for final night together. TOTAL ESTIMATED MEAL COST: Approximately 1,845 USD for 2 people over 21 days (excluding Day 2 family meals, updated after Day 4 dinner change from $13 to $84 = +$71 USD). RedNote verification attempted but MCP Playwright browser installation issues prevented search execution - recommend manual RedNote verification of Shanghai restaurants (search: '老乾杯 上海外滩', '人和馆 上海', 'AJIYA 上海') before booking. All costs are per-person estimates in USD converted from CNY at approximate rate of ¥7.25 = $1 USD.
